author: Simon Difford
description: Carajilo, coffee and liquor or spirit, is a popular serve in Mexico, with Licor 43 being one of the preferred choices due to the delicately spiced rich vanilla notes of the liqueur combining so well with coffee.
name: Carajillo
recipeIngredient: 50 ml Licor 43 (or other spiced vanilla liqueur)

recipeInstructions.text: POUR liqueur into an ice-filled glass then pour coffee over liqueur and stir
